<style>
    .header-container {
        background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.95);
        width: 100%;
        padding: 15px 30px;
        position: fixed;
        top: 0;
        left: 0;
        box-shadow: 0 2px 10px rgba(0, 255, 0, 0.1);
        backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
        z-index: 1000;
    }

    .header-content {
        max-width: 1400px;
        margin: 0 auto;
        display: flex;
        justify-content: space-between;
        align-items: center;
    }

    .logo-container {
        flex: 0 0 auto;
    }

    .logo-image {
        height: 60px;
        width: auto;
        transition: transform 0.3s ease;
    }

    .logo-image:hover {
        transform: scale(1.05);
    }

    .nav-container {
        flex: 1;
        display: flex;
        justify-content: flex-end;
    }

    .nav-list {
        list-style: none;
        margin: 0;
        padding: 0;
        display: flex;
        gap: 40px;
        align-items: center;
    }

    .nav-link {
        color: #00FF00;
        text-decoration: none;
        font-size: 16px;
        font-weight: 600;
        padding: 8px 0;
        position: relative;
        transition: all 0.3s ease;
        text-transform: uppercase;
        letter-spacing: 0.5px;
    }

    .nav-link:after {
        content: '';
        position: absolute;
        width: 0;
        height: 2px;
        bottom: 0;
        left: 0;
        background-color: #00FF00;
        transition: width 0.3s ease;
    }

    .nav-link:hover:after {
        width: 100%;
    }

    /* Dropdown Styles */
    .dropdown {
        position: relative;
    }

    .dropdown-content {
        display: none;
        position: absolute;
        background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.95);
        min-width: 220px;
        box-shadow: 0 8px 24px rgba(0, 255, 0, 0.15);
        border-radius: 4px;
        border: 1px solid rgba(0, 255, 0, 0.2);
        top: 100%;
        left: 50%;
        transform: translateX(-50%);
        padding: 8px 0;
        opacity: 0;
        transition: opacity 0.3s ease;
        backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
        z-index: 1002;
    }

    .dropdown:hover .dropdown-content {
        display: block;
        opacity: 1;
    }

    .dropdown-link {
        color: #00FF00;
        text-decoration: none;
        padding: 12px 20px;
        display: block;
        font-size: 15px;
        font-weight: 500;
        text-align: left;
        white-space: nowrap;
        transition: all 0.2s ease;
    }

    .dropdown-link:hover {
        background-color: rgba(0, 255, 0, 0.1);
        padding-left: 25px;
    }

    .submenu {
        left: 100%;
        top: -8px;
        transform: none;
    }

    .dropdown:hover > .dropdown-content.submenu {
        display: block;
    }

    /* Mobile Menu Toggle */
    .menu-toggle {
        display: none;
        background: none;
        border: none;
        cursor: pointer;
        padding: 5px;
        margin-left: 10px;
        z-index: 1003;
    }

    .menu-toggle span {
        display: block;
        width: 25px;
        height: 3px;
        margin: 5px 0;
        background: #00FF00;
        transition: all 0.3s ease;
    }

    /* Responsive Styles */
    @media (max-width: 1024px) {
        .nav-list {
            gap: 30px;
        }
        .nav-link {
            font-size: 15px;
        }
    }

    @media (max-width: 768px) {
        .header-container {
            padding: 10px 20px;
        }
        .menu-toggle {
            display: block;
        }
        .nav-container {
            position: fixed; /* Changed from absolute to fixed */
            top: 80px;
            left: 0;
            width: 100%;
            background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.95);
            max-height: 0;
            overflow: hidden;
            transition: max-height 0.5s ease;
            z-index: 1001;
            backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
        }
        .nav-container.active {
            max-height: 85vh; /* Limit height to prevent overflow issues */
            overflow-y: auto;
            box-shadow: 0 5px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
        }
        .nav-list {
            flex-direction: column;
            align-items: flex-start;
            width: 100%;
            padding: 20px;
            gap: 15px;
        }
        .nav-link {
            font-size: 16px;
            width: 100%;
            display: block;
            padding: 10px 0;
            position: relative;
        }
        /* Remove underline animation for mobile */
        .nav-link:after {
            display: none;
        }
        /* Add explicit plus indicator for dropdowns */
        .dropdown > .nav-link:before {
            content: '+';
            position: absolute;
            right: 10px;
            top: 50%;
            transform: translateY(-50%);
            font-size: 18px;
            font-weight: bold;
            color: #00FF00;
            pointer-events: none;
        }
        .dropdown.active > .nav-link:before {
            content: '−'; /* Using minus sign instead of rotating plus */
        }
        .dropdown-content {
            position: static;
            width: 100%;
            transform: none;
            border: none;
            box-shadow: none;
            max-height: 0;
            overflow: hidden;
            opacity: 1;
            display: block;
            padding: 0;
            margin-left: 15px;
            transition: max-height 0.3s ease;
            z-index: 1;
        }
        .dropdown.active .dropdown-content {
            max-height: 1000px;
            padding: 8px 0;
        }
        .dropdown-link {
            padding: 10px 15px;
            position: relative;
        }
        /* Style submenu dropdowns in mobile */
        .dropdown-content .dropdown > .dropdown-link {
            padding-right: 30px; /* Space for plus indicator */
        }
        .dropdown-content .dropdown > .dropdown-link:before {
            content: '+';
            position: absolute;
            right: 10px;
            top: 50%;
            transform: translateY(-50%);
            font-size: 18px;
            font-weight: bold;
            color: #00FF00;
            pointer-events: none;
        }
        .dropdown-content .dropdown.active > .dropdown-link:before {
            content: '−'; /* Using minus sign instead of rotating plus */
        }
        /* Fix submenu position */
        .submenu {
            position: static;
            margin-left: 15px;
        }
    }

    @media (max-width: 480px) {
        .header-container {
            padding: 8px 15px; /* Reduce padding for smaller screens */
        }
        .header-content {
            flex-direction: row;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: space-between;
        }
        .logo-image {
            height: 45px;
        }
        .nav-container {
            top: 62px; /* Adjust based on header height */
        }
        /* Better spacing for dropdown items */
        .dropdown-content {
            margin-left: 10px;
        }
        .dropdown-link {
            padding: 12px 10px;
        }
    }

    /* Add margin to page content to prevent header overlap */
    body {

<!-- JavaScript for Mobile Menu -->
<script>
    document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
        const menuToggle = document.querySelector('.menu-toggle');
        const navContainer = document.querySelector('.nav-container');
        const dropdowns = document.querySelectorAll('.dropdown');
        
        // Toggle mobile menu
        menuToggle.addEventListener('click', function() {
            navContainer.classList.toggle('active');
            // Prevent body scrolling when menu is open
            document.body.style.overflow = navContainer.classList.contains('active') ? 'hidden' : '';
        });
        
        // Handle dropdowns on mobile
        dropdowns.forEach(dropdown => {
            const link = dropdown.querySelector('.nav-link, .dropdown-link');
            link.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
                if (window.innerWidth <= 768) {
                    if (dropdown.classList.contains('dropdown') && 
                        dropdown.querySelector('.dropdown-content')) {
                        e.preventDefault();
                        e.stopPropagation(); // Prevent event bubbling
                        
                        // Close other same-level dropdowns
                        const parentUl = dropdown.parentNode;
                        const siblings = parentUl.querySelectorAll(':scope > .dropdown');
                        siblings.forEach(sibling => {
                            if (sibling !== dropdown) {
                                sibling.classList.remove('active');
                            }
                        });
                        
                        dropdown.classList.toggle('active');
                    }
                }
            });
        });
        
        // Close menu when clicking outside
        document.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
            if (window.innerWidth <= 768 && 
                !navContainer.contains(e.target) && 
                !menuToggle.contains(e.target) && 
                navContainer.classList.contains('active')) {
                navContainer.classList.remove('active');
                document.body.style.overflow = '';
            }
        });
        
        // Update menu behavior on window resize
        window.addEventListener('resize', function() {
            if (window.innerWidth > 768) {
                navContainer.classList.remove('active');
                dropdowns.forEach(dropdown => {
                    dropdown.classList.remove('active');
                });
                document.body.style.overflow = '';
            }
        });
    });
</script>

data-animation-class><div><p></p><p>Your audience will be captivated by the illusion of “structures” floating mid-air, transforming the space with objects like rotating fans, geometric cones, and luminous shafts of light that seem to pierce the darkness. These beams of light, with their variable speeds, have the power to transform the mood and atmosphere of any event. They can inject a dynamic, "Star Wars" like vibrancy, full of rapid movement and sci-fi excitement, or they can create a tranquil, mystical ambiance that evokes the serenity of a New Age meditation. Either way, these visual effects add a mesmerizing layer to the experience, ensuring the event remains unforgettable.</p><p></p></div></div><!----><!----><!----><span></span><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----></div><!--]--><!--]--></div><!----><!----><!----><!----><span></span><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----></div><!--]--><!--]--></div><!----><!----><!----><!----><span></span><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----></div><!--]--><!--[--><div data-animation-class><div><p><br>Audience sees specific images displayed in laser light on a large flat surface. We can display seasonal characters (ex: Santa during a Christmas show), various themes, a child’s name with his/her favorite animal, a client’s/sponsor’s logo, or tell a story. Custom designed<br>event or sponsor logos are also possible. </p><p></p><p>A large white or lightly colored smooth surface, such as a wall, water tower, projection screen, side of a building, or thick tree line is      margin: 0 auto;\n        display: flex;\n        justify-content: space-between;\n        align-items: center;\n    }\n\n    .logo-container {\n        flex: 0 0 auto;\n    }\n\n    .logo-image flex: 1;\n        display: flex;\n        justify-content: flex-end;\n    }\n\n    .nav-list {\n        list-style: none;\n        margin: 0;\n        padding: 0;\n        display: flex;\n        gap: 40px;\n        align-items: center;\n    }\n\n    .nav-link {\n        color: #00FF00;\n        text-decoration: none;\n        font-size: 16px;\n        font-weight: 600;\n        padding: 8px 0;\n        position: relative;\n        transition: all 0.3s ease;\n        text-transform: uppercase;\n        letter-spacing: 0.5px;\n    }\n\n    .nav-link:after {\n        content: '';\n        position: absolute;\n        width: 0;\n        height: 2px;\n        bottom: 0;\n        left: 0;\n        background-color: #00FF00;\n        transition: width 0.3s ease;\n    }\n\n    .nav-link:hover:after {\n        width: 100%;\n    }\n\n    /* Dropdown Styles */\n    .dropdown {\n        position: relative;\n    }\n\n    .dropdown-content {\n        display: none;\n        position: absolute;\n        background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.95);\n        min-width: 220px;\n        box-shadow: 0 8px 24px rgba(0, 255, 0, 0.15);\n        border-radius: 4px;\n        border: 1px solid rgba(0, 255, 0, 0.2);\n        top: 100%;\n        left: 50%;\n        transform: translateX(-50%);\n        padding: 8px 0;\n        opacity: 0;\n        transition: opacity 0.3s ease;\n        backdrop-filter: blur(10px);\n        z-index: 1002;\n    }\n\n    .dropdown:hover .dropdown-content {\n        display: block;\n        opacity: 1;\n    }\n\n    .dropdown-link {\n        color: #00FF00;\n        text-decoration: none;\n        padding: 12px 20px;\n        display: block;\n        font-size: 15px;\n        font-weight: 500;\n        text-align: left;\n        white-space: nowrap;\n        transition: all 0.2s ease;\n    }\n\n    .dropdown-link:hover {\n        background-color: rgba(0, 255, 0, 0.1);\n        padding-left: 25px;\n    }\n\n    .submenu {\n        left: 100%;\n        top: -8px;\n        transform: none;\n    }\n\n    .dropdown:hover > .dropdown-content.submenu {\n        display: block;\n    }\n\n    /* Mobile Menu Toggle */\n    .menu-toggle {\n        display: none;\n        background: none;\n        border: none;\n        cursor: pointer;\n        padding: 5px;\n        margin-left: 10px;\n        z-index: 1003;\n    }\n\n    .menu-toggle span {\n        display: block;\n        width: 25px;\n        height: 3px;\n        margin: 5px 0;\n        background: #00FF00;\n        transition: all 0.3s ease;\n    }\n\n    /* Responsive Styles      .header-container {\n            padding: 10px 20px;\n        }\n        .menu-toggle {\n            display: block;\n        }\n        .nav-container {\n            position: fixed; /* Changed /* Limit height to prevent overflow issues */\n            overflow-y: auto;\n            box-shadow: 0 5px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);\n        }\n        .nav-list {\n            flex-direction: width: 100%;\n            display: block;\n            padding: 10px 0;\n            position: relative;\n        }\n        /* Remove underline animation for mobile */\n        .nav-link:after {\n            display: none;\n        }\n        /* Add explicit plus indicator for dropdowns */\n        .dropdown > .nav-link:before {\n            content: '+';\n            position: absolute;\n            right: 10px;\n            top: 50%;\n            transform: translateY(-50%);\n            font-size: 18px;\n            font-weight: bold;\n            color: #00FF00;\n            pointer-events: position: static;\n            width: 100%;\n            transform: none;\n            border: none;\n            box-shadow: none;\n            max-height: 0;\n            overflow: hidden;\n            opacity: 1;\n            display: block;\n            padding: 0;\n            margin-left: 15px;\n            transition: max-height 0.3s ease;\n            z-index: 1;\n        }\n        .dropdown.active .dropdown-content {\n            max-height: 1000px;\n            padding: 8px 0;\n        }\n        .dropdown-link {\n            padding: 10px 15px;\n            position: Different needs and budgets can be accommodated, scaling the spectacle up or down. To discuss a laser show for your event, call us at 252-764-7628 without any sales pressure. During the call, we'll discuss your objectives, desired show type (beam, graphic or combo), venue specifics, anticipated audience size, sound and power requirements, location, whether it’s a solo event, customized music needs, and your budget. Our talented programmers design shows to music and offer package deals for multi-night events, reducing the cost per night significantly. One-time shows are pricier due to fixed overheads, but shared packages or revenue-split events can make them more affordable. At Emerald Owl Productions, we aim to find the right balance for a memorable laser show experience within your budget—multiple nightly shows also hardly impact the price. Once we have the initial details, future planning becomes simpler. Our Story Our Team Gallery Blog Careers Standard In-Person Light Show Drive-in laser shows are perfect for the festive winter, while outdoor shows shine in warmer months, allowing guests to mingle and fully engage, from arm waving to dancing. Laser shows can complement festivals or be featured events, with customizable music themes—from Dancing Through The Decades to Celebrate America, British Invasion, Motown, a Mix, or Christian Rock. Other advantages of a laser show: Need additional performances for an unexpected larger crowd? No worries, we easily rerun shows at minimal cost. Opt for extra nights at competitive prices, leveraging pre-paid overheads with our equipment. Choose from multiple shows, repeat runs, or varied themes to draw crowds. Let's craft your ideal event together. Why Lasers? Lasers offer the most vibrant colors for captivating, dreamlike light displays, exciting audiences with their speed and unique animation. They're versatile for indoor/outdoor settings, drive-in shows, and repeated performances without added cost. Profitable for multi-night events, they pose no fire risk. Consider laser shows as an alternative or complement to fireworks for a breathtaking event, although we don’t supply fireworks, we can collaborate with those who do. Types of Laser Shows Beam Show Your audience will be captivated by the illusion of “structures” floating mid-air, transforming the space with objects like rotating fans, geometric cones, and luminous shafts of light that seem to pierce the darkness. These beams of light, with their variable speeds, have the power to transform the mood and atmosphere of any event. They can inject a dynamic, "Star Wars" like vibrancy, full of rapid movement and sci-fi excitement, or they can create a tranquil, mystical ambiance that evokes the serenity of a New Age meditation. Either way, these visual effects add a mesmerizing layer to the experience, ensuring the event remains unforgettable. Graphic/Animation Show Audience sees specific images displayed in laser light on a large flat surface. We can display seasonal characters (ex: Santa during a Christmas show), various themes, a child’s name with his/her favorite animal, a client’s/sponsor’s logo, or tell a story. Custom designed event or sponsor logos are also possible. A large white or lightly colored smooth surface, such as a wall, water tower, projection screen, side of a building, or thick tree line is needed. Water Effects Reflections: If your venue happens to be next to a body of water, such as a river, lake, sound, etc., let us know. If the audience can be on the other side, a beam show will now reflect in the water. Water Screen: A simply amazing and mystical way to display your images is a water screen. We may be able to do something over the top special for your production at little to no extra charge! The Safest Experience in the Sky Why Are Laser Shows the Safest Option for Entertainment? ✓ Environmentally Friendly No debris, smoke, or chemical residue - just pure light entertainment ✓ Weather Resilient Shows go on in various weather conditions, reducing last-minute cancellations ✓ Noise-Friendly Silent operation perfect for sensitive communities and wildlife Learn More About Laser Show Safety → 🔒 All our shows are fully compliant with FDA regulations and operated by certified technicians LASER SHOW PRICING Laser shows are unique entertainment options where you need details to get an accurate quote. Different needs and budgets can be accommodated, scaling the spectacle up or down. To discuss a laser show for your event, call us at 252-764-7628 without any sales pressure. During the call, we'll discuss your objectives, desired show type (beam, graphic or combo), venue specifics, anticipated audience size, sound and power requirements, location, whether it’s a solo event, customized music needs, and your budget. Our talented programmers design shows to music and offer package deals for multi-night events, reducing the cost per night significantly. One-time shows are pricier due to fixed overheads, but shared packages or revenue-split events can make them more affordable. At Emerald Owl Productions, we aim to find the right balance for a memorable laser show experience within your budget—multiple nightly shows also hardly impact the price. Once we have the initial details, future planning becomes simpler. We strive to overcome pricing challenges and bring your event to life, so let's collaborate!
